metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39801 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In ion_ioctl of ion-ioctl.c, there is a possible use after free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-209791720References: Upstream kernel
